title: Dancing in Darkness
description: Lorenzo is an Immortui, a race of zombies who still have their humanity. He and Louis fight the outbreaks of the Caro Comestores, the other race of zombies who have lost their humanity. When Lorenzo and Louis are sent out for another assignment, Lorenzo meets Kathy. Little does he know how much she will change his afterlife and those around him.
author: R.M. Watters
